thread.section_title: Hotel Newton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A real find on the Upper West Side
thread.title_full: A real find on the Upper West Side - Review of Hotel Newton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JinxieCLT
title: A real find on the Upper West Side
text: While the Hotel Newton is a little dated, it's clean and quiet and provides a perfect location for seeing the city. It's across the street from a subway stop (1, 2, and 3 trains), and there is a very nice Westside Market just a few blocks away, as well as a couple of good fruit sellers. With a refrigerator and microwave in each room, it's handy for keeping a few supplies around. There are tons of great restaurants around as well. Try Tal Bagels! We were on the 9th floor and it was exceptionally quiet. Don't expect a stunning view, but how much are you going to be in your room? Everyone on staff who we dealt with was helpful and polite.
